alert.note: Alert for Brantley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brantley County through 800 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickox, or 9 miles southwest of Nahunta, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickox and Fort Mudge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
